aria-labelledby.description: Adds an accessible name to the selectable input if one is rendered

children.description: Content rendered inside the DataList item (React component or element)

className.description: Additional classes added to the DataList item should be either <DataListItemRow> or <DataListContent>

id.description: Unique id for the DataList item

isExpanded.description: Flag to show if the expanded content of the DataList item is visible

selectableInputAriaLabel.description: Aria label to apply to the selectable input if one is rendered
